member.name: T:Fody.BaseModuleWeaver
member.summary: Base class for module weavers.

member.name: P:Fody.BaseModuleWeaver.Config
member.summary: The full element XML from FodyWeavers.xml.

member.name: P:Fody.BaseModuleWeaver.LogDebug
member.summary: Handler for writing a log entry at the level.

member.name: P:Fody.BaseModuleWeaver.LogInfo
member.summary: Handler for writing a log entry at the level.

member.name: P:Fody.BaseModuleWeaver.LogMessage
member.summary: Handler for writing a log entry at a specific level.

member.name: P:Fody.BaseModuleWeaver.LogWarning
member.summary: Handler for writing a warning.

member.name: P:Fody.BaseModuleWeaver.LogWarningPoint
member.summary: Handler for writing a warning at a specific point in the code

member.name: P:Fody.BaseModuleWeaver.LogError
member.summary: Handler for writing an error.

member.name: P:Fody.BaseModuleWeaver.LogErrorPoint
member.summary: Handler for writing an error at a specific point in the code.

member.summary: Handler for resolving s.

member.name: P:Fody.BaseModuleWeaver.ModuleDefinition
member.summary: An instance of for processing.

member.name: P:Fody.BaseModuleWeaver.AssemblyFilePath
member.summary: The full path of the target assembly.

member.name: P:Fody.BaseModuleWeaver.ProjectDirectoryPath
member.summary: The full directory path of the target project. A copy of $(ProjectDir).

member.name: P:Fody.BaseModuleWeaver.DocumentationFilePath
member.summary: The full directory path of the XML documentation file, if generating the documentation file is enabled in the project. A copy of @(DocFileItem->'%(FullPath)').

member.name: P:Fody.BaseModuleWeaver.AddinDirectoryPath
member.summary: The full directory path of the current weaver.

member.name: P:Fody.BaseModuleWeaver.SolutionDirectoryPath
member.summary: The full directory path of the current solution. A copy of `$(SolutionDir)` or, if it does not exist, a copy of `$(MSBuildProjectDirectory)..\..\..\`. OPTIONAL

member.name: P:Fody.BaseModuleWeaver.References
member.summary: A semicolon delimited string that contains all the references for the target project. A copy of the contents of the @(ReferencePath).

member.name: P:Fody.BaseModuleWeaver.ReferenceCopyLocalPaths
member.summary: A list of all the references marked as copy-local. A copy of the contents of the @(ReferenceCopyLocalPaths).

member.name: P:Fody.BaseModuleWeaver.DefineConstants
member.summary: A list of all the msbuild constants. A copy of the contents of the $(DefineConstants).

member.name: M:Fody.BaseModuleWeaver.Execute
member.summary: Called when the weaver is executed.

member.name: M:Fody.BaseModuleWeaver.Cancel
member.summary: Called when a request to cancel the build occurs.

member.summary: Return a list of assembly names for scanning. Used as a list for .

member.name: P:Fody.BaseModuleWeaver.FindType
member.summary: Handler for searching for a type. Uses all assemblies listed from calling on all weavers.

member.name: M:Fody.BaseModuleWeaver.AfterWeaving
member.summary: Called after all weaving has occurred and the module has been saved.
